text:
Luka, can you review
this photo we took before?

This is how it'll look once it's up
on the official 283Pro website.

Luka, from here on out...
You'll be working with your companions here.

Stuff like companions and freinds...
I'm not so naive that I'll play along with that stuff.

Yeah......
That does seem to be the case......

Precisely because you'll be working together, I think there will
be something important to gain... even for you, Luka────

......Ha! What with that!
You keep having your delusions......
